children.value: (Finish the story to access the area.)
Let me try the Lasallian Prayer.
The food here in Pericos is to die for.
They have chicken, beef, pork and it's all affordable.
I see that you finished your meal! By the way, we practice clean as you go here in DLSU.
Let me also remind you to always bring your I.D. so you can enter the campus.
Also be reminded that plastics and sharps objects such as scissors are not allowed.
Oh!! It is getting late now. Let us go outside!
